casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Lenwood Lee PAIGE No. 186P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018 Mr. Lenwood Lee Paige, for Paige, Lenwood Lee Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ms. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 26th of February 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of February 2018 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."
